property.name: tileVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow)

property.name: layout
property.label: Default Layout
property.description: Select the default list layout. Options are Card, List or Table.

property.name: cardWidth
property.label: Minimum Card Width
property.description: Enter the narrowest size in pixels that cards can be responsively resized in Card view. 200-300 pixels is recommended.

property.name: cardGap
property.label: Card Gap
property.description: Enter the desired spacing between cards in px, em, or rem format. For example, 24px or 1rem.

property.name: textAlign
property.label: Card Text Alignment
property.description: Select the default text alignment for Cards. Options are Left, Center and Right

property.name: IconSecWidth
property.label: Icon Section Width
property.description: Select the Icon Section Width. Options are Wide and Narrow.

property.name: showTitle
property.label: Show Title
property.description: Select to display title.

property.name: showDescription
property.label: Show Description
property.description: Select to display description.

property.name: descriptionLineCount
property.label: Description Lines to Show
property.description: Number of lines to show for the description

property.name: showTreeView
property.label: Show Tree View
property.description: Select to display Tree in Card, List, and Table View

property.name: showBreadcrumbs
property.label: Show Breadcrumbs
property.description: Select to display Breadcrumbs in Card, List, and Table View

property.name: showFileType
property.label: Show File Type
property.description: Select to display File Type.

property.name: showFileSize
property.label: Show File Size
property.description: Select to display File Size.

property.name: showCreatedDate
property.label: Show Created Date
property.description: Select to display Created Date.

property.name: showPreviewAction
property.label: Show View Details Action
property.description: Select to display View Details Action in Card, List and Table View.

property.name: showDownloadAction
property.label: Show Download Action
property.description: Select to display Download Action for Files in Card, List and Table View.

property.name: pageSize
property.label: Items per Page
property.description: This is the number of items that will be loaded per page

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class
property.description: Class for applying custom styling.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates this component to a specific list.
